author: Grace Wade
title: Carbon monoxide foam in the rectum eases bowel disease in mice
description: It's best known as a deadly poison, but in low doses, carbon monoxide can have therapeutic benefits for conditions like inflammatory bowel disease and cancer. Now, researchers may have found a way to deliver the treatment safely in a foam
